body.p: To your Hon B McGoffin Govener of Ky

your Petitioner Richrard Sick States that he was this day arrested for and assault was paid $14 25/100 being only 14 years of age did not understand the Law -- and thane only being one witness that was sworn that testified in the case and it was not proven that the offense was commited in Lawrence count and the Jury was and did find me guilty and find me as afforsaid wher fore your petition say he pray that you may repreave him of the afforsaid fine and he further states that the Judment was for $1425 or 7 day imprisment in the Jale which he Ellected to pay the money where of he pray your Hon will take of a pore Boy -- and repreve him of the afforsaid offense as he has alway has been a good Sitasan and will view as such --

State of Kentucky
Court of Lawrence } Sct

I C M Pack do Certify that the with in named boyR Sick is a good sitazen and a very pore Boy -- and was tride by Jury before me which I think that the Jury Ered in the Case been if he from the instruction of the Court where of I think he ought to be aquited
C M Pack J P l C
